name: The Pitch of Red VR
description: The Pitch of Red is an immersive VR experience that allows the user to experience Synesthesia - a condition that blends two or more senses together. In our experience, users are able to hear the sounds of the colours they see as they wander through the mind of Wassily Kandinsky - an artist who had such condition. The goal of the user is to come closer to experiencing the sensation of synesthesia and see how he drew inspiration for his paintings.
